00020 namespace ldmx {
00021 
00022     RunManager::RunManager() {
00023         pluginManager_ = new PluginManager();
00024         pluginMessenger_ = new PluginMessenger(pluginManager_);
00025     }
00026 
00027     RunManager::~RunManager() {
00028         delete pluginManager_;
00029         delete pluginMessenger_;
00030     }
00031 
00032     void RunManager::InitializePhysics() {
00033 
00034         G4VUserPhysicsList* thePhysicsList = new FTFP_BERT;
00035         G4VModularPhysicsList* modularPhysicsList = dynamic_cast<G4VModularPhysicsList*>(thePhysicsList);
00036 
00037         modularPhysicsList->RegisterPhysics(new APrimePhysics);
00038         modularPhysicsList->RegisterPhysics(new GammaPhysics);
00039         //modularPhysicsList->RegisterPhysics(new TungstenIonPhysics);
00040 
00041         if (BiasingMessenger::isBiasingEnabled()) {
00042 
00043             std::cout << "[ RunManager ]: Enabling biasing of particle type " << BiasingMessenger::getParticleType() << std::endl;
00044 
00045             // Instantiate the constructor used when biasing
00046             G4GenericBiasingPhysics* biasingPhysics = new G4GenericBiasingPhysics();
00047 
00048             // Specify what particles are being biased
00049             biasingPhysics->Bias(BiasingMessenger::getParticleType());
00050 
00051             // Register the physics constructor to the physics list:
00052             modularPhysicsList->RegisterPhysics(biasingPhysics);
00053         }
00054 
00055         SetUserInitialization(thePhysicsList);
00056 
00057         G4RunManager::InitializePhysics();
00058     }
00059 
00060     void RunManager::Initialize() {
00061 
00062         G4RunManager::Initialize();
00063 
00064         PrimaryGeneratorAction* primaryGeneratorAction = new PrimaryGeneratorAction;
00065         SetUserAction(primaryGeneratorAction);
00066         new PrimaryGeneratorMessenger(primaryGeneratorAction);
00067 
00068         UserRunAction* runAction = new UserRunAction;
00069         UserEventAction* eventAction = new UserEventAction;
00070         UserTrackingAction* trackingAction = new UserTrackingAction;
00071         SteppingAction* steppingAction = new SteppingAction;
00072         UserStackingAction* stackingAction = new UserStackingAction;
00073 
00074         runAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00075         eventAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00076         trackingAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00077         steppingAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00078         stackingAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00079         primaryGeneratorAction->setPluginManager(pluginManager_);
00080 
00081         SetUserAction(runAction);
00082         SetUserAction(eventAction);
00083         SetUserAction(trackingAction);
00084         SetUserAction(steppingAction);
00085         SetUserAction(stackingAction);
00086 
00087         RootPersistencyManager* rootIO = new RootPersistencyManager();
00088         new RootPersistencyMessenger(rootIO);
00089     }
00090 
00091 }
